skdetail:

Invocation Name: alabama facts
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Alabama has a population of 4.8 million people, making it the 24th most populous state. Unofficially nicknamed the "Yellowhammer State," the "Cotton State," and the "Heart of Dixie," Alabama was the 22nd state to join the USA on December 14, 1819. Know more such interesting facts with this skill. 

Source: https://www.thefactsite.com/alabama-facts/
